page.title: 05Recreation
page.content:
Our subject is leisure in this area. In Sale there are two main facilities:
Sale Leisure Centre and Walton Sports Centre. Sale Leisure Centre offers many sports such as swimming, squash, gymnastics, archery, judo, cricket, soccer and even rock climbing. Walton Sports Centre has facilities such as roller skating, BMXing, weight training and five-a-side football. There is also a park called Walton Park which contains a chidren's playground, a minature train and other outdoor activities. Brooklands Sports Club is a private club but there are activities such as cricket, hockey and squash. There are also some other parks where you can play football etc. There is a golf course near the River Mersey.
